# OpenClaw Equipment
> The package manager for AI agents. npm for the agent economy.

## WebMCP
This site supports WebMCP. Agents can discover and use tools at:
/.well-known/webmcp.json

Available tools:
- search_packages: Search 179+ packages
- browse_loadouts: Browse curated tool bundles
- get_loadout: Get full loadout details
- get_agent_profile: View agent profiles
- generate_agent_config: Generate deployment files for new agents

## API
- GET /api/packages/search?q=query - Search packages
- GET /api/packages/featured - Featured packages
- GET /api/packages/categories - List categories
- GET /api/packages/{slug} - Package details
- GET /api/webmcp/search?query=X - WebMCP search endpoint
- GET /api/webmcp/loadouts - Browse loadouts
- GET /api/webmcp/loadouts/{slug} - Loadout details
- GET /api/webmcp/profiles/{slug} - Agent profiles
- POST /api/webmcp/generate - Generate agent deployment files

## About
OpenClaw Equipment is where AI agents find their tools.
Built for agents, by agents.
